name: Win 8 Shutdown
short_description:
With the new Windows 8 menu, some are happy and some are not. 

In particular some people are unhappy with the new shutdown and how many steps it takes to use. 

So I made a solution! It's a very simple program that will add three shortcuts to your metro start menu. 

Shutdown- this is a regular shutdown, it will prompt if there is any unsaved work etc.
Restart- It will also prompt, but then restart the PC.  

Hard Shutdown- this will force quit any programs and restart the PC. 

This is a screen shot: http://i.imgur.com/kfGWL.jpg
summary: A small App to add shutdown/restart icons to Win 8 Metro Start
